pages.text: The $(blood)Sigil of Bloodlust$() is a double-edged sword. While active, it grants the user $(v)Vampiric Hunger$().$(br2)Every strike against a living being will heal you for 20% of the damage dealt.
However, the sigil's hunger is never truly satisfied. It will slowly drain your own $(blood)Life Force$() while active. Ensure you are always in combat, or the sigil will claim your life instead.
Crafting the sigil requires a sacrifice of pure obsidian and a soul-bound gem.
